text: Please see the FAQ for why this is happening, what a short term workaround is, and what the long term fix is. http://poi.apache.org/faq.html#faq-N10025

Please try with the latest build from trunk. I recently updated XLSF tests to cover CTTextParagraphImpl$1RList. 

Yegor
